pages.text: <li>consumes <l>(misc/resources#mutagen)Mutagen</l> to force mutations<li>gauges on the left are internal power and mutagen storage<li>requires 1 bucket of <l>(misc/resources#mutagen)Mutagen</l> per operation<li>consumes <l>(misc/crafting_material#labware)Labware</l> in the process<li><l>(misc/crafting_material#labware)Labware</l> and inputs can be inserted from any side

pages.title: Bee Mutations
pages.text: The Mutatron is able to mutate bees.<li>Princess goes in the top slot<li>drone in the bottom slot<li>produces a queen of a new species that will produce pure bred offspring when she dies<li>creatures from artificial sources (a.k.a. ignoble stock) have a chance of not surviving the mutation process

pages.title: Tree Mutations
pages.text: The Mutatron is able to mutate trees.<li>the sapling goes in the top slot<li>the pollen goes in the bottom slot<li>produces a sapling of a new species
Can be used to create new species of bees.
